entry.title: Emigrant Lives Telegram Bot
entry.summary: A demo bot that provies insights on cities with large Russian expat communities. Perfect for potential movers or the curious! t.me/EmigrantLivesBot The bot employs TinyGods' data processing pipeline, fetching and aggregating information from multiple sources including public APIs and websites.
entry.content:
A demo bot that provies insights on cities with large Russian expat communities. Perfect for potential movers or the curious!

t.me/EmigrantLivesBot

The bot employs TinyGods' data processing pipeline, fetching and aggregating information from multiple sources including public APIs and websites.
